Package org.greatage.ioc.proxy

This package represents all classes for working with object proxies.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Invocation This class represent method invocation in environment of MethodAdvice.
MethodAdvice This class represent method advice that is used to advice object proxy methods with some additional functionality.
ObjectBuilder<T> This interface represents proxy generation data.
ProxyFactory This class represents utility producing proxy creation around object builders that instantiates the actual object only as needed with all configured method advices.
 

Class Summary
AbstractInvocationHandler<T> This class represents utility for lazy creation of object from object builder.
AbstractProxyFactory This class represents abstract proxy factory representation that helps to validate input parameters for creation proxy.
AdvisedInvocation This class represents Invocation proxy implementation that adds method advices logic to invocation delegate.
CGLibInvocationHandler<T> This class represents implementation of invocation handler for CGLib proxy objects.
CGLibProxyFactory This class represents proxy factory implementation using CGLib library.
JavassistInvocationHandler<T> This class represents implementation of invocation handler for javassist proxy objects.
JavassistProxyFactory This class represents proxy factory implementation using javassist library.
JdkInvocationHandler<T> This class represents implementation of invocation handler for JDK proxy objects.
JdkProxyFactory This class represents proxy factory implementation using JDK.
MethodInvocation This class represents Invocation implementation that is based on configured instance method invocation.
 

Package org.greatage.ioc.proxy Description

This package represents all classes for working with object proxies.
